subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Tigers and the Indians have allowed the Twins to creep back into the American League Central race. If Minnesota can make its annual run, Matt Garza, right, could be a contributing factor. In six starts since being called back up from the minors, Garza, the team’s top pitching prospect, is 1-3, but he has a 1.70 earned run average.
